entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
